extensionDescription.message: Warns if a domain or subdomain is an internationalized domain name to prevent fishing attacks.

pageActionTitleWarn.message: A subdomain is an internationalized domain name: $URL$
pageActionTitleWarn.description: Tooltip if a subdomain (not 1st or 2nd level domain) is an IDN.

pageActionTitleFatal.message: This domain is an internationalized domain name: $URL$
pageActionTitleFatal.description: Tooltip if 1st or 2nd level domain is an IDN.
